name: Santa's Mission (Lazer Blade Studios)
description:
Welcome to Santa's Mission!

CONTROLS:

Use WASD or arrow keys to move, and mouse to look and spray. Click to throw snowballs. M to skip to boss fight.

STORY:

It is Christmas Eve and your elves have turned on you. They have stolen your hat and you cannot start Chtistmas without it. The elves are being led by the giant elf Arcadon.
